article_title: Holy Wisdom Monastery is now MGE's largest solar customer
article_text:
Madison, WI (53711)

Today

Thunderstorms in the morning, then skies turning partly cloudy late. High near 85F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%..

Tonight

Some clouds and possibly an isolated thunderstorm after midnight. Low 63F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , holy wisdom monastery, madison gas and electric
article_metadata.author: Jessica VanEgeren| The Cap Times

og.description: The monastery in Middleton now has 463 solar panels, producing roughly 145 kilowatt hours of power.
